attributes.action: take immediate action to improve the treatment of wounded service personnel & better and more immediate treatment by Vetrans Agency of those who has substaned injury in the service of their Country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent press reports of the treatment of by sub standard treatment received wounded service personnel and also the treatment of ex-service personnel by the Government and the Veterans Agency show the utter contempt of this Government has for those that have and those that continue to put their lives at risk in defence of this country.

We ask that immediate action be taken to address these issues.

Examples being:

The disbandment of military hospital.
The time taken by the Veterans Agency to deal with enquiries.
The sub-standard awards made to service and ex-service personnel when compared to those made to civilians.
The lack of equality in relation to the provision of free medical prescriptions.  
etc
